Revelations 5 Solve

This cipher was took 3,451 days to solve!

This cipher went unsolved from September 6, 2016 until February 17, 2026, spanning 3,451 days.

Congratulations to randomiser141 for solving this cipher! This is the longest time taken to solve a cipher in the history of the series (beating GK 12 by just 9 days), and it is a testament to the difficulty of this cipher.

La/s8qMsB
Length: 2208 characters

Solution

Section titled â€œSolutionâ€
  • Credit to randomiser141 for solving this cipher!

Important notes

Section titled â€œImportant notesâ€
The algorithms described in this solution are using a deprecated PHP library called "mcrypt". This library uses CFB8 instead of nCFB (as pretty much all modern tools use). Because of this distinction, you cannot actually solve these ciphers using modern libraries or tools like CyberChef. You need to find a library or tool that supports cfb8. There is one website in particular that does support it, which you can find here.

Steps

Section titled â€œStepsâ€

Step 1: RC2 (CFB) decrypt with key â€œZombiesâ€ and hexadecimal IV 30303030303030303030303030303030.

Step 2: Reverse the hexadecimal output and convert from hex to base64.

Step 3: Blowfish (CFB) decrypt with key â€œZombiesâ€ and hexadecimal IV 30303030303030303030303030303030.

Step 4: Loki97 (CFB) decrypt with key â€œZombiesâ€ and hexadecimal IV 30303030303030303030303030303030.

Plaintext

Section titled â€œPlaintextâ€

August, 1946. OSS report final T-7. All of the Group 935 and Division 9 facilities we were able to procure have been dismantled and crated. We have 215 scientists heading back to the United States for orientation. July, 1947. OSS asset transfer request. We are requesting that Dr. Shuster be transferred to Broomstick and the Titan Project because of extensive intimacy with Group 935â€™s long range rockets. If approved, we will have him onsite at White Sands for the first Titan Project test as an observer. As you know it is imperative that we advance Titan quickly and reach the anomaly before the Russians.
